body_html: Judging by the dynamics of this bug and other forks Google has zero interest in this and will never implement this in the official repository. I would vote for closing this issue (or locking it) at all to not give any false hopes for everyone.
body_text: Judging by the dynamics of this bug and other forks Google has zero interest in this and will never implement this in the official repository. I would vote for closing this issue (or locking it) at all to not give any false hopes for everyone.
body: Judging by the dynamics of this bug and other forks Google has zero interest in this and will **never** implement this in the official repository. I would vote for closing this issue (or locking it) at all to not give any false hopes for everyone.
